info.description: This documentation for access Mulo Music Streaming
info.title: Mulo Music Streaming API

get.description: Get paginated list of albums

parameters.description: Album object that needs to be created
parameters.name: album

get.description: Get a Album by their ID

put.description: Update the album with the specified ID

parameters.description: album object that needs to be updated
parameters.name: album

404.description: Not Found: album or artist not found

delete.description: Delete the album with the specified ID

get.description: Get list of albums by artist id
Get list of genres by artist id

404.description: Not Found: Genre or artist does not exists.

409.description: Conflict: Genre already exists on artist.

404.description: Not Found: Genre on artist does not exists.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token if successful.

parameters.description: login object that needs to be created
parameters.name: login

get.description: Returns profile information of the currently authenticated user based on the provided JWT token.

post.description: Create a new user account and sends a verification email.

parameters.description: register object that needs to be created
parameters.name: register

post.description: Resends the verification code to the user's email if it hasn't been verified yet.

parameters.description: resend object that needs to be created
parameters.name: resend

get.description: Checks whether the user's email has been verified.

post.description: Verifies the user's email address using a verification code.

parameters.description: verify object that needs to be created
parameters.name: verify

404.description: Email or Code does not exists.

get.description: Get paginated list of favorite songs

404.description: Not Found: Song does not exists.

409.description: Conflict: Song already exists on favorites.

404.description: Not Found: Song on favorites does not exists.
